Detailed Description

Base class for all signature processors.

Member Function Documentation

◆ Sign() [1/2]

array< System::Byte > IonicSecurity::SDK::SignatureProcessorAbstract::Sign ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbyMessage)

Perform message signing.

Parameters
[in]mpbyMessagePointer to input message byte array.

This function performs message signing using the method implied by the class name (e.g. RsaSignatureProcessor).

Returns
Returns byte array containing the signature.
See also

◆ Verify() [1/2]

void IonicSecurity::SDK::SignatureProcessorAbstract::Verify ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbyMessage,
array< System::Byte >^  mpbySignatureIn 
)

Perform signature verification.

Parameters
[in]mpbyMessageInput message byte array.
[in]mpbySignatureInsignature byte array.

This function performs signature verification using the method implied by the class name (e.g. RsaSignatureProcessor). If signature verification fails, an SdkException will be thrown.

See also
Verify(const String^, array<System::Byte>^)
VerifyFromBase64(const String^, String^)
VerifyFromBase64(array<System::Byte>^, String^)
